metadata.title: CVE-2015-8559 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The knife bootstrap command in chef Infra client before version 15.4.45leaks the validator.pem private RSA key to /var/log/messages.

criterions.comment: chef: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
